author: Lon.TV
description:
Find the Pro 3 : https://lon.tv/jfvkm and the Ultimate 2 Bluetooth : https://lon.tv/sygdk on Amazon (compensated affiliate links). 8bitdo's latest firmware for the Pro 3 and the Ultimate 2 Bluetooth controllers will now wake the Nintendo Switch 2 with just a shake. I'll show you how to get them working in this update video. See more 8bitdo: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIt2qhI5w4F0TJj9zOkXKABa and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:05 - Step 1 - Firmware update
01:42 - Step 2 - Pairing Process
02:28 - Step 3: Shake to profit
02:46 - Tips and observations
03:21 - Conclusion

title: 8bitdo Can Now Shake to Wake the Switch 2! How to guide
